titles.title: FAA and TSA Family and Medical Leave Act
FAA and TSA Family and Medical Leave Act

A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide family and medical leave to employees of the Federal Aviation Administration and the Transportation Security Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
FAA and TSA Family and Medical Leave Act
This bill revises the personnel management system of the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to provide FAA employees, including Transportation Security Administration employees, the same family and medical leave benefits as other federal employees.
